name: Laptop Battery Optimizer
tagline: Batch Application to play alarm when laptop battery gets fully charged, as a reminder to unplug the charger.
body:
BatchLaptopBattery
==================

Batch Script to play 'beep' sound when laptop battery gets fully charged, as a reminder to unplug the charger.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
